mapper.insert: insert into t_device_info (imei, os, osVersion, phoneModel, brand, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{imei}, #{os}, #{osVersion}, #{phoneModel}, #{brand}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE osVersion=values(osVersion), phoneModel=values(phoneModel), brand=values(brand), modifyTime=values(modifyTime)
